name: bulk-email-platform
description: A comprehensive bulk email platform with multi-tier SaaS service

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../admin-frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules admin-frontend/node_modules backend/node_modules shared/node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:admin && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:admin && npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:shared
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:admin && npm run format:backend && npm run format:shared
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:shared
